statements: SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE last_visit > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, last_visit FROM Patients ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, reason_for_visit FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, reason_for_visit FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND patients.gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, CASE WHEN gender = 'M' THEN 'Male' ELSE 'Female' END AS gender_formatted FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_birthdate, patient_contact_number FROM patients WHERE patient_birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY doctor_name, patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, years_of_experience FROM doctors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id=1 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, email FROM doctors WHERE years_of_experience > 10 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;

SELECT patients.full_name, doctors.full_name, appointments.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female' AND appointments.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT doctors.full_name AS doctor_name, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM doctors LEFT JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctors.full_name HAVING appointment_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT id, specialty, years_of_experience FROM doctors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, completed FROM appointments WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, instructions FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM doctors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, d.specialty FROM patients p JOIN doctors d ON p.id = d.id WHERE d.specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT m.medication_name, m.dosage, p.first_name AS patient_firstname, p.last_name AS patient_lastname FROM prescriptions m JOIN appointments a ON m.appointment_id = a.id JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.id;

SELECT mh.medical_condition, mh.diagnosis_date, p.first_name AS patient_firstname, p.last_name AS patient_lastname FROM medical_history mh JOIN patients p ON mh.patient_id = p.id WHERE mh.diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
